attributes.additional_details: Because I don't believe the public voted for this economic approach.  I don't think these cuts will trickle down.  The government is not acting in a democratic manner.
attributes.background: Stop cutting taxes for the rich.  Level up don't trickle down.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Reverse the tax cuts announced in the mini budget
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623929
